Description: Equity capital (common equity) of the bank. Represents the bank's net worth.
Realised profits of the bank for the current period, calculated from interest spreads.
Expected profits of the bank, used for forward-looking decisions.
A residual and balancing item on the bank's balance sheet (assets minus liabilities).
The interest rate for loans and mortgages set by the bank.
Net disposable income of the bank owner, derived from the bank's profits.
Consumption budget of the bank owner.
Investment budget of the bank owner.
Realised consumption of the bank owner.
Realised investment of the bank owner.
Capital stock held by the bank owner.
Bank deposits held by the bank owner.
